alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Bear River Range; Big Hole Mountains; Caribou Range; Centennial Mountains, Island Park; Teton Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 05 at 8:47AM MST until March 05 at 3:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph which could create issues with blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Arco/Mud Lake Desert, Bear River Range, Caribou Range, Big Hole Mountains, Teton Valley, Centennial Mountains, Island Park Region. This includes Mud Lake, INL, Craters of the Moon NM, Emigration Summit, Wayan, Swan Valley, Victor, Ashton, Tetonia, Driggs, Island Park, and Kilgore * WHEN...Until 3 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Bear River Range; Big Hole Mountains; Caribou Range; Centennial Mountains, Island Park; Teton Valley
